name: Gutterball: Golden Pin Bowling HD
description:
Strike Gold and collect a wide range of bowling balls, awesome alleys and cool power-ups! If you've been searching for a fun bowling game on iOS, THIS is the game to play!

IMPORTANT!!! In this release we have added customizable bowling balls... see more below.

SUPPORTED DEVICES: all ipads

GUTTERBALL BOWLING HIGHLIGHTS:
• A true bowling game with dazzling graphics and amazing pin physics
• Clean & crisp throwing action lets you spin your bowling ball like a pro
• Golden Pins are earned for bowling well, allowing you to unlock new alleys bowling balls, 3 unique power ups and customizable bowling balls.
• Awesome Power Ups, including a BOMB, a SPLITTER, and an INFLATOR.

FEATURES:
• Incredible bowling alleys and fantastic bowling balls
• House, Style and Effect bowling balls to unlock, each more awesome than the last
• Customizable bowling balls. Add photos or use the textures from the game.
• Bowlers who spin the ball like a pro can earn up to 3x multiplier on their Golden Pins
• Game Center enabled with 8 Leaderboards and 40 bowling achievements

INCLUDED IN THE FULL VERSION:
• 2 Unlocked Alleys
• Steering is Unlocked
• Reduced item costs.
• 4 Unlock-able Bowling Alleys - Pumpkin Fields, Cosmic Alley, Lotus Lane and Ice Dragon
• 5 Colorful Bowling Commentators
• 10,000 Free Golden Pins. Unlock a lot of content.
• No ads


HISTORY:
The original Gutterball 3D bowling game premiered in 2002. It reached #1 on many portals and stayed in RealArcade's Top 10 for an unprecedented 54 weeks. Gutterball 2 arrived in 2004 with all-new crazy bowling alley designs, much improved visuals and physics, and new features galore. And now, in 2011, Gutterball: Golden Pin Bowling is all-new and ready to go! We think it's the finest bowling game on the App Store and we've played them all.

You be the judge... is this Gutterball the best bowling game ever?
